article_title: UAMS Chancellor Dan Rahn Attacks Red Ink With Balanced Budget Plan
article_text: The University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences had an operating loss of $27.8 million in the first six months of its current fiscal year, a dramatic downturn from an $8.5 million operating gain during the same period a year earlier.

article_metadata.keywords: Little Rock, Business Journal, Business news
